items.content_html: Mini Translator App is a lightweight JavaScript application that utilizes the My Memory Translator API to provide quick and accurate translations. This project is perfect for those looking to integrate translation features into their web applications or for anyone interested in learning how to work with external APIs in JavaScript.
items.title: UlviParviz/translator-js: Mini Translator App is a lightweight JavaScript application that utilizes the My Memory Translator API to provide quick and accurate translations. This project is perfect for those looking to integrate translation features into their web applications or for anyone interested in learning how to work with external APIs in JavaScript.
